error.title: Something went wrong!
error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. An unexpected error has occurred.

rate_limit.title: Too Many Requests

signin.title: The software suite for governments
signin.description: Built for local, state and federal authorities
signin.session_expired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
signin.email_info: You will receive a one-time code from us via email to log in without a password
signin.failed_to_login_with_password: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.

otp.find_code: You will find your one-time code in your email inbox
otp.code_sent_info: We have sent a 6-digit code to {{email}}

otp.no_code: Didn't receive a code? Check your email address, look in your spam folder or contact us
otp.invalid_code: Your code or email is invalid. Please try again

mfa.request_mfa_desc: Please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to proceed.
mfa.setup_title: Setup authenticator app for your account
mfa.scan_qr: Scan the QR code with your authentication app on your smartphone (e.g., Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, or Duo). If you don't have one installed, download it from the App Store or Google Play Store.
mfa.scan_qr_desc: You'll be prompted to enter a code on the next screen to confirm setup.
mfa.verify_code: Now please enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app.
mfa.invalid_code: Your code is invalid. Please try again.
mfa.remove_mfa_desc: Are you sure, you want to remove TOTP? This will make your account less secure.
mfa.setup_success_desc: You can remove TOTP from your account at any time. However, we do not recommend doing so.

organization.leave_organization_desc: Are you sure you want to leave this organization? This action cannot be undone.

organization.remove_member_desc: Are you sure you want to remove the member {{email}}? This action cannot be undone.
organization.remove_member_error_desc: An error occurred while deleting the member. Please try again.

dashboard.description: Here you can find your favorites, solutions and workspaces.

error.maxLength: Must not be longer than {{length}} characters.

error.arrayNotEmpty: This field must not be empty.

datasets.errorTitle: Sorry, there was an error with the dataset selection
datasets.errorDescription: You can try to undo your last action or reset the dataset selection.
datasets.joinTypeInnerDescription: Keeps only the rows that have matching values in both tables.
datasets.joinTypeRightDescription: Keeps all rows from the right table, and the matching rows from the left table.
datasets.joinTypeLeftDescription: Keeps all rows from the left table, and the matching rows from the right table.
datasets.joinTypeFullDescription: Keeps all rows from both tables.
datasets.joinOnColumnsDescription: Here you can specify which columns should match between tables when combining the data.
datasets.joinOnColumnsDescriptionUnspecified: If no conditions are specified, columns are automatically matched by name.
datasets.cannotFindSelectedDatasetWarning: The selected dataset cannot be resolved. Do you still have access to it?
datasets.undefinedColumnInOnConditionWarning: A condition is incomplete. Please choose a column or remove the condition.
datasets.cannotFindColumnInJoinOnConditionWarning: At least one selected column can not be resolved. Please choose a new column or remove the condition.
datasets.incompatibleDataTypesInOnConditionsWarni: The data types of a join condition are not compatible.

columns.errorTitle: Sorry, there was an error with the column selection
columns.errorDescription: You can try to undo your last action or reset the column selection.

pak.pak_desc: Personal access keys (PAK) allow you to access the API without using your username and password. PAKs are valid for a limited time and can be used from any device.

pak.delete_pak_success_desc: The access key has been successfully deleted.

pak.token_desc: Copy your Personal Access Key, as it will not be visible again after you finish.
pak.api_keys_desc: Personal access keys (PAK) allow you to access the API without using your username and password. They are valid for a limited time and can be used from any device.

pak.empty_description: You haven't created any access keys yet.

no_slots_available_prompt.description: You have reached the maximum number of personal access keys allowed. Please delete an existing key before creating a new one.
